title: How to Make Curds and Whey

steps.headline: Place two cups of milk in the saucepan.
steps.description: Slowly bring the milk to the boil, while stirring constantly. It is very important to constantly stir the milk or it will burn.

steps.headline: Turn off the heat once the milk is boiling.
steps.description: Leave the saucepan on the heat source to cool slowly.

steps.headline: Add 4 teaspoons of vinegar or citrus fruit juice to the boiling milk.
steps.description: At this point, the milk should cuddle and turn into curds and whey. Scoop out the curds and store separately. Use as required.
